instructions:
Butter bread on a cutting board and cut into 1 inch squares. In a 7 x 11 x 2 inch buttered Pyrex baking
dish, place layers of half bread cubes, all sausage pieces and half Cheddar cheese. Then final layers of
remaining bread cubes and remaining Cheddar cheese. Blend eggs, milk, Worcestershire, mustard, salt and
pepper in a bowl and pour over the bread layers. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight. Bake in
a 350-degree oven for 45 to 50 minutes or until puffed and golden. Serves 6. *(Revised 11/25/94)*
ingredients: 8 small sausage links, cooked and sliced bite size
4 oz sharp Cheddar cheese, shredded (1 cup)
name: Cheese And Sausage Strata
